response.original_title: Polo & Pan live at Serre Monumentale in Paris
response.overview: Polo & Pan playing a live set in the beautiful Serre Monumentale for Cercle, in partnership with evian.  Artist: Polo & Pan  Singers: Victoria & Corine  Venue: Serre Monumentale - Parc André Citroen, Paris  Produced by Cercle & evian  Tracklist:  00:00 Le Grand Blond avec une chaussure noire (Vladimir Cosma cover) 02:00 Barbatuques - Baião Destemperado (Polo & Pan Edit) 03:00 Polo & Pan - Zoom Zoom 07:00 Banda Ionica - Lorenzo in Sicilia (Polo & Pan Remix) 10:30 Polo & Pan - Coeur d'Artichaut 13:25 Polo & Pan - Pili Pili 16:30 Corine - Pluie Fine (Polo & Pan Remix) 20:50 Polo & Pan - Aqualand 25:30 Polo & Pan - Bakara 30:20 Polo & Pan - Dorothy (P&P's Club Friendly Edit) 35:30 Polo & Pan - Kirghiz 37:30 Polo & Pan - Jacquadi 43:15 Polo & Pan - Mexicali 47:25 Polo & Pan - Rivolta 51:24 Polo & Pan - Nana 54:40 Polo & Pan - Plage Isolée 59:30 Polo & Pan - Canopée 1:06:20 Interview with Polo & Pan  This artistic performance has been recorded live.
response.tagline: Polo & Pan playing a live set in the beautiful Serre Monumentale for Cercle, in partnership with evian.
response.title: Polo & Pan live at Serre Monumentale in Paris
